Class BigTwoClient

java.lang.Object
BigTwoClient
All Implemented Interfaces:
NetworkGame
public class BigTwoClient extends Object implements NetworkGame
The BigTwoClient class implements the NetworkGame interface. It is used to model a Big Two game client that is responsible for establishing a connection and communicating with the Big Two game server.
Version:
2.0
Author:
Masood Ahmed
See Also:
NetworkGame

  • Constructor Details

    • BigTwoClient

      public BigTwoClient​(BigTwo game, BigTwoGUI gui)
      A constructor for creating a Big Two client. The first parameter is a reference to a BigTwo object associated with this client and the second parameter is a reference to a BigTwoGUI object associated the BigTwo object.

    • setPlayerID

      public void setPlayerID​(int playerID)
      A method for setting the playerID (i.e., index) of the local player. This method will be called from the parseMessage() method when a message of the type PLAYER_LIST is received from the game server.
      Specified by:
      setPlayerID in interface NetworkGame
      Parameters:
      playerID - ID of the local player

    • connect

      public void connect()
      A method for making a socket connection with the game server. Upon successful connection, It will (i) create an ObjectOutputStream for sending messages to the game server; (ii) create a thread for receiving messages from the game server.
      Specified by:
      connect in interface NetworkGame

    • parseMessage

      public void parseMessage​(GameMessage message)
      A method for parsing the messages received from the game server. This method should be called from the thread responsible for receiving messages from the game server. Based on the message type, different actions will be carried out.
      Specified by:
      parseMessage in interface NetworkGame
      Parameters:
      message - the specified message received from the server

    • sendMessage

      public void sendMessage​(GameMessage message)
      A method for sending the specified message to the game server. This method should be called whenever the client wants to communicate with the game server or other clients.
      Specified by:
      sendMessage in interface NetworkGame
      Parameters:
      message - message that needs to be sent
